roadrunner.ast

类 SimpleNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • roadrunner.ast.NodeAdapter
      • roadrunner.ast.SimpleNode
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Node
    直接已知子类:
    ASTAnd, ASTHook, ASTPlus

    public class SimpleNode
extends NodeAdapter
implements Node, java.lang.Cloneable

      • jjtGetChild

        public Node jjtGetChild(int i)
        从接口复制的说明: Node
        This method returns a child node. The children are numbered from zero, left to right.
        指定者:
        jjtGetChild 在接口中 Node
        覆盖:
